snippet: Mayor Boris Johnson of London, the crazy-haired and incorrigible provocateur, is often a thorn in the side of his fellow Conservative Party member, Prime Minister David Cameron.
abstract: Memo From Birmingham; London Mayor Boris Johnson, blustery and incorrigible provocateur who may be the future Tory party leader, is often a thorn in the side of his fellow Conservative Party member, Prime Minister David Cameron.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Boris Johnson of London, the crazy-haired and incorrigible provocateur, is often a thorn in the side of his fellow Conservative Party member, Prime Minister David Cameron.

headline.main: A Mayor With a Prime Minister in His Shadow
headline.print_headline: A Mayor With a Prime Minister in His Shadow
